name: Crazy Circus
description:
“Crazy Circus” is a big game in the City Game, Game Hall. Very welcomed by the players!
Interesting circus! Funny music! Exciting animation! Simple game!

Description:
1.Click on the screen. The Coins will drop from the top of the outlet slot.
2.Coins through the “SPIN” lights to start three ERNIE Figure
3.Suprise Awards: From left to right, two of the same fruit.Drop some coins,Number of fruits Score.
4.Lucky Award: Three of the same fruit, playing turntable (smashing SPIN, give you the appropriate dial points).
5.Special Award: Two of the same fruit + clown ,hit hat (Cumulative score of the fruit, until OUT date).
6.Clown Award: From left to right, a clown, an ugly scores; 2 clown ,2 ugly scores; 3 clown, 3 ugly scores.
7. Hit the lights of the fruit, the fruit Score plus 1.
8. Hit the lights OUT, eliminating scores of lit.
9. To invest a certain amount of coins, clown scores will be added.
10. Coins fell into the bottom of the box, users get the corresponding number of coins.
11. Daily users if not coins, will be presented the user some coins.



Good Luck!!
